channel.title: Kicked out of boxing

item.title: Kicked out of boxing
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Hello everyone, I am trying to make a system that kicks you out of the boxing ring if they are not wearing the boxing suit and are in the boxing ring. I already have the place where I want them to be whent hey are kicked out but I canâ€™t fix this:

client.java:8791: illegal start of expression if(BoxSuit() == false) && (!isInBoxing() = true) { ^ client.java:8791: ';' expected if(BoxSuit() == false) && (!isInBoxing() = true) { ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

And here is my system:

if(BoxSuit() == false) && (!isInBoxing() = true) { triggerTele(3077, 3527, 0); sM("you Have Been Kicked Out Of The Ring As You Are Not"); sM("Wearing A Boxing Suit"); }

Yes I do have a isinboxing boolean, and yes I do have a boxsuit that works perfectly.
So here is my isinboxing boolean code:

public boolean isInBoxing() { if ((absX >= 3068 && absX <= 3075 && absY >= 3523 && absY <=3531)) { return true; } else { return false; } }

Read full topic
